channel.title: Need help making commands

item.title: Need help making commands
item.dc:creator: @koala_sex koala sex
item.description:
@koala_sex wrote:

Hey i need help making bootall command
iv got this one but it only dc’s me and no one else please help i want it to kick all

if (playerCommand.startsWith(“update”) && c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Brodie”)) {
String[] args = playerCommand.split(" ");
int a = Integer.parseInt(args[1]);
PlayerHandler.updateSeconds = a;
PlayerHandler.updateAnnounced = false;
PlayerHandler.updateRunning = true;
PlayerHandler.updateStartTime = System.currentTimeMillis();
}

Read full topic
